data.title: HR department pays price of false accusations at Renault
data.meta_description: Heads have rolled at Renault following an HR failure that led to three employees being sacked after being falsely accused of industrial espionage.  Patrick Pelata, the French carmaker’s chief operating officer, has stepped down, although he will remain with the firm, while Jean-Yves Coudreau, the HR manager responsible for senior executives, legal director Christian Husson […]
